Package com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreeperLog
    This class is used for all the outputting to the console and to players.
    CreeperMessenger
    A class to handle custom messages to players.
    CreeperPermissionManager
    Handler for permissions.
    CreeperPlayer
    Utility class for player permissions and warnings.
    CreeperUtils
    A utility class for common tasks used in several places.
    DateLoc
    A simple utility class to store a date and a location.
    FactionHandler
    A handler for the Factions plugin.
    FileUtils
    A class to handle common file operations.
    MetricsLite  
    NeighborDateLoc
    Implementation of the NeighborFinder for DateLoc.
    NeighborExplosion
    Implementation of the NeighborFinder for explosions.
    NeighborFinder<T>
    2-D map, allowing for fast neighbor search.
    NeighborFire
    Implementation of the NeighborFinder for burnt blocks.
    Point
    Utility class to store a simple 2-D point with integer coordinates.
    ShortLocation
    Represent the minimum values (three integer coordinate) needed to represent a block.
    Suffocating
    Utility class to check if a player is suffocating, and teleport him to safety.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CreeperPlayer.WarningCause
    The different infractions that are recorded for a player.
